total.title: Total
total.description: Sum of all line amounts (calculated, maps to `total`).

lines.title: Lines
lines.description: List of food vouchers issued to the customer's employees (maps to `Conceptos`).

FoodVouchers.description: FoodVouchers carries the data to produce a CFDI's "Complemento de Vales de Despensa" (version 1.0) providing detailed information about food vouchers issued by an e-wallet supplier to its customer's employees.

curp.title: Employee's CURP
curp.description: Employee's CURP ("Clave Única de Registro de Población", maps to `curp`).

FoodVouchersEmployee.description: FoodVouchersEmployee represents an employee that received a food voucher.

e_wallet_id.title: E-wallet Identifier
e_wallet_id.description: Identifier of the e-wallet that received the food voucher (maps to `Identificador`).

issue_date_time.title: Issue Date and Time
issue_date_time.description: Date and time of the food voucher's issue (maps to `Fecha`).

employee.title: Employee
employee.description: Employee that received the food voucher.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Amount of the food voucher (maps to `importe`).

FoodVouchersLine.description: FoodVouchersLine represents a single food voucher issued to the e-wallet of one of the customer's employees.
